intent_context: No longer wants to own the property
steps: Monitor queue and return to call
Advise on business hours for callback
failure_detail: Agent cannot process ownership termination or schedule callbacks.

policy_gap.specific_gap: Cannot process ownership termination or schedule outbound callbacks
policy_gap.customer_ask: End ownership and receive a callback
policy_gap.blocker: AI is restricted to general info and inbound routing only

summary: The customer wanted to end their timeshare ownership and requested a live representative. After a long hold in the queue, the AI explained it could not process terminations or schedule callbacks, advising the customer to call back during business hours.
verbatim: We want to no longer have ownership over it.
coaching: The agent performed well given the constraints, but the transition back from the long hold could be smoother by acknowledging the specific wait time elapsed.

actions.detail: Attempted transfer to concierge, no agents available
Provided business hours and callback instructions
